translations.english: Zhang Han besieged Tian Rong at Dong'e.

translations.chinese: 沛公與項梁共救田榮，大破章邯東阿。
translations.english: Pei Gong and Xiang Liang together went to rescue Tian Rong and greatly defeated Zhang Han at Dong'e.

translations.chinese: 田榮歸，沛公、項羽追北，至城陽，攻屠其城。
translations.english: Tian Rong returned. Pei Gong and Xiang Yu pursued the defeated enemy north to Chengyang and attacked, massacring the population of the city.

translations.chinese: 軍濮 陽東，復與章邯戰，又破之。
translations.english: The army encamped east of Puyang and again battled Zhang Han, defeating him once more.
Zhang Han recovered his strength and defended Puyang, surrounding it with water.
